entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndexOutOfRangeException in System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive #109167
  • Upgrading Blazor to new AspNetCore requires aggressive project bin/obj folders deletion #109166
  • Microsoft.Bcl.TimeProvider 8.0.1 contains incorrect linker substitution resources #109163
  • How to Cross Compile Linux-arm64 Native Shared Libraries on Ubuntu x64 Platform #109162
  • Tag 9.0.0-preview.6.24327.7 is missing the `v` prefix #109158
  • Stack overflow from ILLink when LogWarning called #109157
    10.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName with ForceUTF8Encoding causes Country encoded as UTF8String on .NET 8 Linux #109156
  • [NativeAOT] LibraryImport resolves to own exported functions with the same name, even if a custom module name is specified #109150
  • Strange behavior of System.ComponentModel.Int128Converter #109148
  • Support compiling Android on Windows #109142
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Normally only one use of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is allowed #109141

Closed

  • Regression: 'dotnet msbuild' publish fails with 'PublishAot' unless 'SelfContained' is also set #109154
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTaskPerfTest + 3 related #108291
  • Directory.Exists() returning correctly for paths involving "i" characters on Turkish locale machine #109160
  • Publishing Blazor with AOT:true hangs then fails on generic partial-scoped class references #109128
  • Deserializing a record instance, causing child elements to be duplicated when using configuration binder Get<T> method #109139
  • Android App .Net 8-Consume WCF with large data time out #109068
  • Workstation GC Performance #90555
    Future
  • Missing activity due to invalid nibble encoding in ActivityTracker.AddIdToGuid for some 12 bits values in EventPipe ActivityID generation #109078
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate2Collection.FindByThumbprint for more digest algorithms #104643
    10.0.0
  • Add correct instruction execution characteristics for AVX-VNNI instrinsics #52121
    Future
  • Proposal: Support delegate signature equivalence #4331
  • GCStress=C not implemented for OS X #6135
  • Windows SDK tools do not support working with heavy portable symbols files. #108833
  • Cannot export RSAParameters from X509Certificate2 in .NET 9 RC2 #109059
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ForceUTF8Encoding to only apply to certain AttributeTypes #109159
    area-System.Security
  • Bump Android devcontainer from Jammy to Noble #109153
    area-Meta, os-android
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove dotnet9 nuget feeds #109149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix stress-http pipeline #109140
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Synthesize assembly names by default for ilproj-based tests #108997
    test-enhancement, area-ILTools-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Update AVX-VNNI instruction perf characteristics #109038
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • [ActivityInfo] Avoid writing extra byte by updating length #109132
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add X509Certificate2Collection.FindByThumbprint #109130
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #108145
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] Permit unencrypted key exports from CNG #109134
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Use the SDK support for packaging up PGO data in a way that can be consumed in other projects #109169
    area-Infrastructure, PGO, 10.0.0
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [cdac] Implement `ISOSDacInterface::GetModule` and `IXCLRDataModule::GetFileName` #109133
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs and CDacMetadata contracts #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Introduce transient code mechanism for SPCL. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [mono][interp] testing #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    area-System.Net
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Sync with PR#107282: Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks. #109102
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Bump serialize-javascript #108883
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Propagate static readonly loads by value during inlining #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix GC stress log and analysis #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Add DispatchThunk support, fix issues in functions #2727

Updated

  • HikingApp Mac Catalyst sample app #2726
    area-SwiftBindings
  • documented swift closures #2724
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Oct 24 #2720

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Help customers keep their .NET SDK tooling up to date. #44421
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44416
  • ParseContainerProperties task normalizes the registry part of the repository #44408
  • Assembly uses 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=18.0.0.0 which has a higher version than referenced assembly 'Microsoft.iOS' with identity 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=17.2.0.0 #44388
  • dotnet watch Fails in Blazor #44384

Closed

  • dotnet.exe pack ignores pack=false #44374

PullRequests

Created

  • [ADD] dotnet solution: Migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #44402
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update checksum links to use SHA512 #44383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to the shipped RC2 build #44364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix and simplify logic for setting the minimum VS version to display in the installer UI #44412
    Servicing-approved
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2567461 #44385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #44375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Address MD linter issues in VMR README.md #44376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Windows DevVersions VMR build leg #44387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove manual home variable lookup #44266
    Review for breaking changes, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Aspire
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

Issues

Updated

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix TestHandleExceptionFromGetCompletionChange flakiness #75611
  • IDE0076 False Positive #75608
  • Provide an option for empty / self-closing tags in any XML-based language #75607
  • Unreachable code detection does not respect local scopes and throw statements #75605
    Backlog
  • Remove sourcebuild workaround from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild.BuildHost.csproj #75602
  • IDE0058 / IDE0029 does not handle multiple discards when at least one is from a parameter #75599
  • Make `path` a first-class citizen attribute of the `<inheritdoc />` tag #75598
    Backlog
  • Make `langword` a first-class citizen attribute of the `<see />` tag #75597
    Backlog
  • Cyclic assignment should generate a ref safety error #75592
    17.13

Closed

  • `CompilersIOperationGenerator` error should cause the correctness leg to fail #75603
    17.13
  • [LSP] Return the same resultId if the diagnostic report is the same #75240
  • [UI] Indent incompatible types in CS0029 error popup in a way they can differ easier #58682
    Backlog
  • Several StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException/System.InvalidCastExceptions when working in a mixed VB/C# solution #75590
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlCient Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Principal.Windows' #51054
    Backlog
  • .net9 rc1 roslyn crashes on this oneliner: #75577
    17.13
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 when using IEnumerable<ReadOnlySpan<>> as a return value #75569
    17.13
  • What do you mean lack of feedback? I'm here!! :) #75575

PullRequests

Created

  • Use distinct EventSource names for compiler and workspace layer events #75613
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable flakey test TestHandleExceptionFromGetCompletionChange #75612
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce lock usage during EditDistance.GetEditDistance and BKTree.Find #75610
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix spelling of an error message #75601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Propagate spread suppression #75596
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK and Gladstone versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference to avoid including msbuild dependencies #75561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make generate-compiler-code fail if CompilersIOperationGenerator encounters a problem #75604
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • [LSP] Report unchanged results if diagnostic data is the same as last report #75587
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not share trees across files shared in different language projects #75606
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update source-build team references #75536
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Field-backed properties: recognize field in interpolated string #75566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword, Next
  • Disallow ref like types as iterator element types. #75593
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Remove "untriaged" label on issue closure or milestone addition #75582
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • IncrementalBinder - properly bind else-if statement #75579
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • When replacing CodeStyle analyzers do not provide Features analyzers fallback options #75534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • While trying to run on WSL "Failed exporting the certificate" #58599
  • ASP.NET Core 2.1 becomes ASP.NET Core 2.3 #58598
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, updates #58595
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring, updates #58594
  • Blazor: Accessing HttpContext in a Client Project #58593
  • Enable the KeyForFile-Configuration to handle multiple files with the same name but different locations #58585
  • Custom Validation Messages Not Displaying for Nested Object Models in Blazor EditForm #58584
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, endpoint, json #58581
  • Header Propagation Cannot Be Used in `HybridCache` #58580
  • Error Method not found: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.EventCallback deploy blazor wasm stand alone use Lazyload #58579

Closed

  • [Blazor] Exception when adding an InteractiveServer component inside .Client project (Rendermode Auto project) #58597
  • Using of CancellationToken in RemoteJSDataStream #50676
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58576
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext #58563
  • Perf regression: json #58582
  • Cannot attach to browser to debug blazor WebAssembly when using own TLS files #58590
  • Blazor OIDC Not Redirecting to Provider for Login after failed silent login attempt #58591
  • Crippled Visual Studio 2022 debugging performance on Blazor Web (WASM components) after updating to .NET 9 #58577
  • .net #58583
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, single_query #58536
  • Perf improvement: https, json #58553

PullRequests

Created

  • 54978 02 #58592
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #58587
    * NO MERGE *

Merged

  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • use nameof for CallerArgumentExpression #58514
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Improve dev-certs export error message #58472
    area-commandlinetools, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • if actual bytes to be written is negative, set to zero #58575
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Prevent unnecessary debugger stops for user-unhandled exceptions in Blazor apps with Just My Code enabled #58573
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 9.0.1
  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Diagnostics client fails to create dump when path has spaces #5020
    10.0.0
  • Single File module scan takes a very long time (symbol lookup) #3737
    10.0.0
  • When CLR hasn't been initialized in the process, SOS should mention that when commands fail #2197
    10.0.0
  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884
    10.0.0
  • gctonative requires IMemoryRegionService #3913
    10.0.0
  • CLRMD don't provide StackBase and StackLimit for full memory dumps #4198
    10.0.0
  • "dotnet-dump ps" truncates commandline arguments at 60 positions #4443
    10.0.0
  • SOS Warning: Loading symbols for dynamic assemblies is not yet supported #4753
    10.0.0
  • DumpStackObjects doesn't seem to work if the thread is on the alternate signal stack #4814
    10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #25489
  • iOS Buttons' text and image are centered on estimates that may be a pixel off at times #25488
  • iOS Button Flickering Animations when Layout Updates #25487
  • Update .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid and Web App template to use the new static web assets support in .NET 9 #25478
  • CollectionView can't scroll to the last item when TabBar and NavigationBar are visible #25474
    Backlog
  • MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25473
    Backlog
  • Setting both IconImageSource and Text properties in ToolBarItem not working as expected on macOS and iOS. #25472
    Backlog
  • [Android] Collection view has no scroll bar #25468
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid different rendering on different platforms #25464
  • [MAUI]Scrolling performance shows overlap on laptop. #25463
    Backlog

Closed

  • [UITest] Enable Stepper Control so that it can work with Appium on all platforms #25120
    .NET 9 SR1
  • CollectionView scrolling properties #25292
  • WebAuthenticator Redirect URI Issue Using OAuth 2.0 Client IDs #25323
  • StackLayout inside Scrollview with horizontal orientation not expanding #25462
  • TitleBar API doc mistake #25238
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Status bar overlays on BlazorWebView in Blazor Hybrid app #25477
  • Referenced assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms does not have a strong name #25439
  • Support background image on splashscreen iOS #12639
    Backlog
  • Background gradients don't work for some views #25193
    Backlog
  • Remove excessive Comments from all Controls #25398
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Button Regression with null image source #25485
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Fix Shell.Flyout menu disappears when pressing Alt key #25479
  • [Windows] Improve AOT compatibility on Windows #25476
  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Documentation] Fix TitleBar comment mistake #25480
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [testing] Move to run the catalyst device tests on arm #25486
  • [testing] Move to run the catalyst device tests on arm #25482
    testing-infrastructure
  • [Testing] More ignore attributes for UITests #25345
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Stable #25475
  • Background gradients fixes #25194
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Remove excessive BoxView API comments #25399
    area-docs, community ✨
  • [testing] These Semantic tests seem to fail often on MacCatalyst #25408
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR1
  • Add note to PR template about only targeting main #25402
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [testing] These Semantic tests seem to fail often on MacCatalyst #25459
    .NET 9.0 GA

Updated

  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • For Android, respect Minimum/Maximum size requests even when size is set #25164
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • 25421- ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp and BindingError was occured in windows platforms #25453
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Perf : ButtonContentTypeConverter now using InvariantCulture to parse… #25393
    community ✨, area-controls-button, t/perf
  • Add New .NET MAUI Template with Syncfusion Toolkit Integration #25419
    area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Create `DatePickerDialog` on demand #25363
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Improve performance of rendering `DatePicker` #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • List content of nested OwnsMany dropped on owned entity change #34965
  • Cosmos does not translate string concat where at least 1 parameter needs to be converted to a string #34963
  • EFCore 9 RC2 - Issue with translation of DbFunction when EF.Constant is used as an argument #34962
  • Not using updated ConnectionString #34961
  • System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data. #34960
  • System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.String' to type 'System.Int32'. #34959

Closed

  • `AlterColumn` not generating SQL for non-nullable constraint #34955
  • HasConversion no longer supports captured Object in EF Core 9, when using projection #34956
  • Updating JSON column when query tracking is disabled throws #33862

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply fix from #34729 to Cosmos SqlExpressionFactory to keep it in sync #34964

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [ARM64] With NET7 RC1 installed, some files in the .exe installer and the .zip package are not identical #14279

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade Fedora CI legs to 41 #20216
  • Update checksum links to use SHA512 #20215
